chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Sahra Covenry, p. 21 (8)—Black-haired novice, perhaps 15 or 16, who escorts Min to the Amyrlin Seat's study. On the way, the two ran into Gawyn, who was on his way out of the Amyrlin's study, and Sahra heard nothing of the conversation that Min and Gawyn had due to her going “calf-eyed” over him.
